metadata.title: CVE-2024-45506 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
HAProxy 2.9.x before 2.9.10, 3.0.x before 3.0.4, and 3.1.x through 3.1-dev6allows a remote denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-45506` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

haproxy - 2.0.33-0ubuntu0.1
vim-haproxy - 2.0.33-0ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: haproxy package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.33-0ubuntu0.1').
